mapper.select: select * from patient where name LIKE CONCAT(#{name},'%')
select * from patient order by name asc
mapper.insert: insert into patient (name, email, contact, dob, insurance, gender) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{contact}, #{dob}, #{insurance}, #{gender})
mapper.update: update from patient set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, contact = #{contact}, dob = #{dob}, insurance = #{insurance}, gender = #{gender} where idx = #{idx}
